comment: Take this professor for anything you can! He only has 3 exams for each class he teaches but you can always bounce back if you fail one. He also rounds grades! I recommend taking good notes even his stories throughout lecture. He does give study guides that are the same as exams. I had him for 3800, 4500, and 4550. You do need to show up!

Funniest professor ever I genuinely have never laughed so hard in any class. Super passionate and extraverted. Grade is from 3 exams only, no homework, he does curve for the exams. There are no powerpoints either so if you miss lecture you will miss learning. Just stay engaged in his lecture and you will do fine. Always answers questions. Great guy
There are no powerpoints, but it is not hard to focus in his class. Study guides were literally identical to his exams.
I have a hard time paying attention but I am able to remember every word he says in lecture. This is the second time in my college car
He is super energetic and cares about what he teaches. His tests aren't too difficult. You will do well if you study the material.

Great if you don't care much about the content or only care about an easy A. He dumbs down material a ton which is great for your grade, not great if you are going on to grad school and need this foundational knowledge. He spends plenty of class time off topic and rambling about himself. Pretty disappointing and irritating. Don't buy the textbook.
rating_tags: Lecture heavy--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment:
THE BEST PROFESSOR TAKE HIM FOR EVERYTHING YOU CAN!
only reason I enjoy college really.

Dr. Mr. McLester was hands down the BEST professor I have taken at KSU. He is very straightforward with what you need to know for the tests. There are only 3 tests for the whole class but he gives back points on all of them. He is such a kind soul.

Best professor I've ever had, genuinely an awesome man. I was excited to go to class and hear him speak every day. Definitely take him if you can. 3 tests determine your grade, but he really cares about his students and explains the material very well. He makes sure each student knows hes available for questions any time about anything. No homework

Dr. Mclester is one of my favorite professors here at KSU! I have taken him for biomechanics, ex phys 2 , and lab testing. For lab, we were tested on blood pressure, heart rate, and body composition. We had some long lab reports to write but we were graded fairly. The class overall was interesting and participation matters. Learned a lot.

Dr. Mclester is one of my favorite professors here at KSU! For Ex Phys 2, he grades by 3 exams. No cumulative final which is great. His test questions sometimes are hard to understand but if you memorize his powerpoints then you should be fine.

Professor McLester knows his material!! Class grades are based off of three exams only. MUST GET NOTES IN CLASS TO PASS. Ex Phys II has no study guide, but he does dedicate a day to form an OUTLINE of what the test will cover. He gave out A LOT of extra credit points on the tests and pulled me to an A with the extra credit points.

He is one of my favorite professors at KSU! Graded on 3 tests only! His lectures can get boring at times but they are interesting. I would definitely take him again. Tests are based on his study guide. Just don't study last minute and you'll be fine. Great guy take him!

Professor McLester has been the most enjoyable teacher I've had so far at KSU. While sometimes he may go off on a tangent, he relates it back to class material. I had already taken physics l the semester before, so I was already aware of many of the topics in this class. However, he helped me understand physics better than my physics teacher.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Amazing lectures

comment: McLester is great! He knows how to teach to make sure you understand the content. He answers questions so well and makes sure he gets you an answer. Super funny and quirky. Only grades by 3 exams but curves grades based on questions missed. Gives a lot of information that isnt super necessary but narrows down content. Super great teacher overall.
rating_tags: Respected--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Favorite professor I have ever had. Exams were very predictable in 3800, even for 4000 level classes, he never veered off of what he talked about in class for exams. Also, very funny, knowledgeable, helpful, and clear with what he expects in class and on exams.

Great professor. Really knows his stuff and mainly lectures without many words on his slides so you must show up to take notes. I've only taken the first test this semester (supposed to be the hardest) and got an A+. Graded on 3 tests the last of which is not accumulative.

One of the best classes I've taken. He is so funny and actually cares enough to explain everything and help you learn it. I did not buy the book and got an A. But I would suggest going to every class because what he talks about is exactly what are on the tests.

Dr. McLester is the best teacher I have ever taken. He makes all of the information incredibly simple, doesn't overwhelm you with information each class, and separates the tests very well. Dr. McLester could make a Netflix series lecturing and I would probably binge watch it. Not a class where the teacher tries to cram information down your throat.

I have much respect for Mr. McLester, his teaching style, and the way he engages with students. I thoroughly enjoyed being in his Biomechanics class and also having him teach a portion of Ex Phys while our professor was on maternity leave. Hes funny, honest, and very smart to say the least!

Favorite professor at KSU hands down. He has basically no power points so you have to go to class to learn, but the classes are so great it doesnt matter. I loved going to this class to learn. If you have to take ES 3800 you will be sorry if you dont take him. Hes very accomodating to make sure everyone completely understands and is hilarious.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures

comment: Best professor at KSU without question. Natural gift for teaching. He truly wants you to do your best, and he understands we have other classes and a life outside of school. 3 tests (last one non cumulative). He taught in a way to help me understand general physics. He also teaches you important life lessons. He is SO nice, and HILARIOUS.

McLester is an AMAZING professor. hands down the best professor ive ever had in my school career. Wears awesome tshirts every day. Make biomechanics go from a difficult class to a very understandable class. He also understands we have other classes and feels we need to focus on those ones. Hes awesome!

Hilarious professor. You HAVE to go to class or you won't know what's going on because he doesn't have PowerPoints. DO NOT BUY THE BOOK you do not need it at all. 3 tests and he is very lenient when it comes to giving A's.

Class is optional but be there because you won't know whats going on if you don't show up to class but its worth going because his lectures are super funny and he knows how to keep class interesting. You don't need to buy the book. Went to class and participated and made an A. Extremely respected teacher, would take for anything else.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Hilarious--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Dr. McLester is hands down one of the best professors at KSU.  Biomechanics is a tough class from all of the physics but he makes it easy to understand.  I had the book but didn't read a page because his lectures are literally the text (he wrote it).  He understands we have other classes and juggle busy schedules so he isn't a harsh grader. 4 tests

Biomech is an amazing subject and although the guy assisted in writing a textbook on it he fails to use the class period on deeply exploring the subject. Instead the class is 80% off topic comedic jokes, and him venting, or bashing student. We spent the first week's lectures on him threatening to ruin our careers if we caused him any trouble. Sad.

Seriously the best professor I've ever had. His lectures are easy to follow and he makes sure to explain everything multiple times and from different angles. He knows his stuff and seems to enjoy his job more than the average professor. He's always willing to help, and even helped me with another class I was taking this semester. Highly recommend!!
Go to class. Take notes. Study the night before the test. Easy.
Love Dr. McLester.

Best professor EVER! He is SO funny and makes the material very interesting. I highly recommend him for any class you can take with him. He is very knowledgeable and willing to help all of his students.

EXCELLENT PROFESSOR!!!!Hilarious.  Extremely Competent!!!Uses practical, everyday, normal people examples that are understandable.  Love, love, love!!!  If I could just have him teach every class I take I would have understanding for all classes (& subjects for that matter)!!!!

Teaching perfection! 1.5hr lectures fly by and you don't want to leave. He is the teaching jackpot, hit it! You never want to skip class. I made an A+ in 4300 but I studied well. He just makes the material so interesting that you want to study. He brings physiology to life with funny examples and applications. Tests are largely essays, give detail

Best Professor I Have Ever Had!! I loved his class and would take it again. He explained the material wonderfully and made it so interesting. There was never a dull moment. You can tell he wants his students to succeed.

There are not enough words to describe how great this professor is. He actually made it so you want to come to class. He has a straight lecture style that explains the material perfectly. When you go home to study, you feel like you already have a great understanding of the material. He is extremely funny and knowledgeable. Best professor at KSU!

Took biomech over the summer and now Ex Phys 2 during the fall. BEST PROF ON KSU'S CAMPUS!! He can explain material without the use of textbooks. Makes concepts easy to understand. Has a great sense of humor that keeps class entertaining. Manages to make the punch lines of jokes the concept he's teaching (really helps make the material stick)

Makes biomechanics easy to understand,which is great if you have never had a physics class before.  Tests are easily passable if you just do the study guide and go to class, with slightly more effort, an A is easy to achieve.

AWESOME, AWESOME, AWESOME, HANDSOME, HANDSOME, HANDSOME! OTHER THAN THAT, this professor is extremely HELPFUL, fun, and passionate about what he does! He scared me when he came to my 2100 class, but i learned that he wasn't a bad professor at all! TAKE HIM even if u have to switch your whole schedule.
Love him. Enough said. Absolutely take him for anything and everything you possibly can. I'm sitting in one of his classes in the fall just for fun. Awesome professor.

GREAT professor!  I throughly enjoyed his class.  He remembers you if you see him around campus and never ceases to be friendly.  Great sense of humor... made learning easy.  I would take him for every class at kennesaw if I could, he is a students dream prof.
Amazing professor! He is a students dream! Funny is an understatement, his humor makes learning very difficult material easy! He will give u help whenever u need it after class...
Must go to class but it only seems 5 minutes long.

BEST TEACHER AT KSU! He is hilarious and such a treat to have as a prof. You will be spoiled after taking him! there is no need for a book bc what he says (ALL OF IT) is the test, that is why its mandatory to go to his class. He doesnt take attedance but he knows when you arent there. plus class is so interesting you'll actually want to go!

One of the top five professors I have ever had. Go to class, it is fun! You'll learn quite a bit while being entertained. I also found Dr. McLester to give very helpful advice about college in general.
Great experience! He is the best professor you could possibly take. Take Him!!!! If you take notes and pay attention study and ask questions he is the one for you.

One of the best professors I've ever had. Really knows his subject and enjoys teaching it. The exams are only hard if you do not go to class. If you go to class and take notes and study then you will pass this exam. The subject is not easy, he is just a good, interesting and funny prof.

Funny instructor who keeps you entertained. Studied a lot for his exams with the first one being the most difficult. Take lots of notes and do the labs/exam review sheets to study for the exams. Project was time consuming so can't do it the night before. Must go to class to understand material even though it's not mandatory.

THE BEST PROF EVER! He is funny, helpful, makes sense and is awesome! I try and take as many classes with him as possible. You have to work and study but he gives you everything you need and offers extra help if you need it. If you go to class and try you will do great!

He's a great teacher. I've had him for HPS 3800, 4500 and 4350. He is able to make hard material very easy to understand. He's funny and enjoys what he does for a living and it shows through his teaching.   Oh and no he has NOT written 2 biomechanics textbooks. Who in their right mind would write 2 textbooks on the same subject? NO ONE!

Great PROF!  Ultra funny, cute, and SMART!  Doesn't use PowerPoints at all and ALL his tests are essays.  He's always available- just shoot an email, or pop in his office.  Don't piss him off - he'll talk about you for the rest of his classes!  Somewhere, there's an idiot that decided to argue with him about steriods.  LOL!

Best professor ever. Makes even hard material easy to understand. Very helpful, will do anything possible to get you to understand the material. Makes it easy to apply to real life situations. Loves his job, and it shows. Great personality and very funny. A definite recommend!

He loves his job and it shows through his teaching. He makes learning fun and has the ability to make hard subjects seem very easy to understand. He's an extremely helpful teacher and is very easy to talk to. Kennesaw did their students a favor when they hired him.

Greatest professor I've ever had.  He knows his stuff (Written 2 biomechanics textbooks) and he's hilarious.  Easy to talk to, easy to learn VERY complicated stuff from, just an amazing teacher.  If I wasn't already an EHS major I'd change majors just to have classes with him he's that good.

This is the best teacher and friend a college student could have.  Dr. Mclester makes college the most fun enviornment.  Best teaching style of any professor out of my four years at kennesaw.  If you dont take his class you are missing out on life.
he's super funny and entertaining and cute too

Dr. McLester is the best teacher at KSU in the HPS Department...NO DOUBT. He is not easy, neither is Biomechanics. He makes it easy and understandable, not only that you can really apply it. He's funny, HOT, and funny. His teaching makes you want to go to class. I gotta B

He is new to KSU and a wonderful addition.  He is very helpful.  Great entertainment in the morning.  I learned more in this class about anatomy than I did in the anatomy class.  Don't miss class or you will miss out on information not in the book.
